mapper.update: update inventory_contract_commodity set inventory_contract_guid = #{dto.inventoryContractGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, crop_commodity_id = #{dto.cropCommodityId, javaType=java.lang.Integer , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, total_unseeded_acres = #{dto.totalUnseededAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, total_unseeded_acres_override = #{dto.totalUnseededAcresOverride, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, total_seeded_acres = #{dto.totalSeededAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, total_spot_loss_acres = #{dto.totalSpotLossAcres, javaType=java.lang.Double , jdbcType=NUMERIC, mode=IN}, is_pedigree_ind = #{dto.isPedigreeInd, javaType=java.lang.Boolean , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_user = #{userId, javaType=java.lang.String, jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}, update_date = now() where inventory_contract_commodity_guid = #{dto.inventoryContractCommodityGuid, javaType=java.lang.String , jdbcType=VARCHAR, mode=IN}
mapper.select: from inventory_contract_commodity icc left join crop_commodity cc on cc.crop_commodity_id = icc.crop_commodity_id where icc.inventory_contract_guid = #{inventoryContractGuid} order by cc.commodity_name, icc.is_pedigree_ind

SELECT icc.crop_commodity_id, cc.commodity_name as crop_commodity_name, icc.is_pedigree_ind, icc.total_seeded_acres FROM inventory_contract ic JOIN inventory_contract_commodity icc ON icc.inventory_contract_guid = ic.inventory_contract_guid JOIN crop_commodity cc ON cc.crop_commodity_id = icc.crop_commodity_id WHERE ic.contract_id = #{contractId} AND ic.crop_year = #{cropYear} AND icc.total_seeded_acres > 0 ORDER BY cc.commodity_name
